name: 52 Moons
description:
Tutorial

Introduction
During the late antiquity, after the fall of Rome and it administrative and bellicose, some northman folks acquired some of the costumes and culture from the mediterraneans. You are a patriarch from a sharply clan, and you need to make the families survive a year on a new land totally different from what they saw back in the North.

Resources
In the top of the left corner, is found a function of each villager, which can be altered according to necessities of the player.  The resources for survive are:
Food
The villagers have certain particularities. Men villagers consume more food that women. Search this resource in day period, as your consume it’s made in night.
Which functions provide these resources?
- Gathering;
- Hunting;
- Fishing;
Men villagers have aptitude to hunting and fishing. Women have aptitude to harvesting. 
Aptitude is a quantity of resource you will obtain, in other words, better ability in hunting,   you will succeed more amount of this resource.

Wood
Used as firewood, has an objective to prevent in night periods, the villagers get cold. In seasons next to winter, these necessities intensify, requiring more resources.

Faith
The faith factor influence on quantity of resources that you collect, according to the quantity of this factor. To obtain faith, use your priest in function to pray. He can be used to other functions, but he will collect less resources that a normal villager.
